resources.string: Select from a previously started game:

Before you start, this is not a game by itself.

This app is meant to be used with the Welcome To The Moon game to allow you to flip cards easily, save your game and save precious table space.

You must have access to the physical game in order to play, this just replaces the three stacks of number and action cards.

All mechanics, theme and gameplay of the game belong to the designers Alexis Allard & Benoit Turpin.

If you don't already have the game, you can check it out at BoardGameGeek:
Welcome To The Moon on BGG
Don\'t want to see ads? Click
